pages.text: It seems magical beings, like Evokers, cast spells by chanting and waving. They seemed to know how to cast these spells by heart through long studies and rituals. Fortunately, you've found a way to cast spells without prolong study by using a wand.
Using the newly discovered Cursed Ingots, you are able to use Soul Energy to cast spells.
However, the wand needs a Focus in order for a spell to be cast. Once the Focus is fitted in the wand, all the user must do is concentrate on the spell and have enough Soul Energy to cast a spell.
